derivation: or צוֹפַי; or צִיף; from H6688 (צוּף); honey-comb;
outline:
Zuph or Zophai = "honeycomb"
  1. a Kohathite Levite, ancestor of Elkanah and Samuel
  2. a district northwest of Jerusalem where Saul encountered Samuel
strongs_def: Tsuph or Tsophai or Tsiph, the name of an Israelite and of a place in Palestine
